W-17 NAEB Video Recording Workshop - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor
Report of the Video Recording Workshop held in the WTTW Studios,
Chicago, Illinois, May 5-9, 1958, for engineers from educational
TV stations operating kinescope, recorders. 1958. 62 pp. Paper. $1.00
W-18 NAEB Seminar on Children1 s Television Programs - Harold E. Hill, Editor
Report of the Seminar on Childrenâ€™s Television Programs held
at Boston University, March 29-April 1, 1958, for educational and
commercial broadcasters of children*s TV programs. 1958. 37 pp.
Paper. $2.00
W-21 NAEB Radio and Audio" Engineering Seminar - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor
Report of the Radio and Audio Engineering Seminar held at Allerton
Park, University of Illinois, May 27-June 1, 1956, for technical
personnel in NAEB member radio stations. July, 1956. 23 pp#
Paper. $1.00
W-22 NAEB TV Lighting and Staging Workshop - Hazen J. Schumacher, Editor
Report of the TV lighting and Staging Workshop held at the University
of Michigan, August 19-22, 1956, for ETV personnel actively engaged
in lighting and staging work. February, 1957. 10 pp. Paper. 50$
W-23 NAEB TV Program Planning Seminar - William G. Harley, Editor
Report of the Program Planning Seminar, for personnel actively
engaged in planning of programs for ETV stations and production
centers, held at the University of Wisconsin, August 26-September 1,
1956. February, 1957. 64 pp. Paper. $1.00
W-26 NAEB Research Seminar for Educational Television and Radio - I. Keith
Tyler, Editor
Report of the Research Seminar for Educational TV and Radio held
at Ohio State University, December 9-13, 1957, for research
specialists in educational broadcasting. 1958. 31 PP# Paper.
$1#00
W-27 NAEB Seminar on Instructional Uses of Television and Radio - Elaine
Aft on, Editor
Report on the Seminar of instructional uses of TV and Radio held
at Purdue University, July 21-25, 1958, for TV staffs associated
with educational broadcasting and educators responsible for
training prospective teachers. 1958. 62 pp. Paper. $2.00
